name: Pre-K Program (3-5y/o)
description: Pre-K Programs - Serves ages: Children 3-5 Years Pre-K Curriculum: - A play-based program that prepares children for kindergarten - Multilingual teachers lead activities in math, science, literacy, arts, and enrichment - Trips to local libraries, take-home books, and workshops support literacy education - Requirement that all children are fully potty-trained before enrolling with us. Children that are learning English are encouraged to enroll, as teachers provide individualized support and trans

cost: Tuition is made monthly, beginning on the date of registration. Tuition is based on enrollment in the program session dates and not based on attendance. A $50 non-refundable registration fee is due annually and for new enrollment. 2024 Tuition Costs: Tuition for 3-year-olds: $165 per week + $50 fee Tuition for 4 and 5-year-olds: $100 per week + $50 fee
address: 2565 San Bruno Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94134
